pohſtiyis. Vnd wings ai-
tzenaya to/ vnd ẜatziya vs
to: Ko dſirrſchu es no töw?
Dohd laghadibu no ta-
was Nammaturreſcha-
nas/ Aiſto tu nhe warri nu
joproyam weens Nammaturrätais wairs buht. Tas
Nammaturrätais runnaya py ẜöw paſſcham/ ko buhß
mann darrieth? Manns Kungs jämm to Nammatur-
reſchanu no mann. Rackt mann nhe ghribbahß/ es kau-
nohß arridſan deedeleht. Es ghann ſinnu/ ko es ghrib-
bu darrieth/ kad es no to Ammatu nozälltz tohpu/ ka tee
mann ẜawahß Nammahß ee=jämm.
Vnnd tas aitzenaya py ẜöw wiſẜus Paraddneekus
ẜawa Kunga/ vnd ẜatziya vs to pirrmo: Zeek eſẜi tu man-
nam Kungam parradà? Wings ẜatziya: Ꞩimbt Mut-
tzus Olye. Vnnd tas ẜatziya vs winju: Jemm tawu
Ghramatu/ ẜehdees/ vnnd raxti tudeļļ peezedeßmitz.
Pehtz to ẜatziya tas vs to Ohtru: Bett tu/ zeek dauds
eſẜi tu parradà? Wings ẜatziya: Ꞩimbts mähru Que-
ſcho. Vnnd tas ẜatziya vs winju: Jemm tawu Ghra-
matu/ vnd raxti aſton=deßmitz. Vnnd tas Kungs teitze
to nhetaißnu Nammaturrätayu/ ka tas ghuddrige dar-
riyis by. Aiſto tee bährni ſchahß Paſẜaules gir ghud-
draki/ nhe ka tee Bährni tahß Ghaiſſchumas/ eekſchan
ẜawu Raddu. Vnnd es ẜacku jums arridſan/ darraita
jums arridſan Draugus ar to nhetaißnu manntu/ ka
tad kad jums peetruhxt/ tee juhß vsjämm eekſchan to
muhſchigu Dſiewohklu.
Epiſtel am zehenden Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 1. Corinth. 12.
MJeļi Brahļi/ no teem Gharrigheem dahwaneem nhe
ghribbu es jums paſlehpt. Juhß ſinnaht/ ka juhß Pag-
gani eſẜeeta biyuſchi/ vnnd noghayuſchi py teem mäh-
meem Ällkadeeweem/ ka juhß tad wäſti tappaht. Tapehtz
buhß jums ſinnaht/ ka nhe weens JEſum nolahd/ katters
zaur to Deewa Gharru runna. Vnd nhe weens nhe warr
JEſum parr Kungu ẜauckt/ ka ween zaur to ſwätuſwàtu Gharru.
Tur gir daſchadi Dahwani/ bett tur gir weens Gharrs/
vnd tur gir daſchadi Ammati/ bett tur gir weens Kungs/ vnd
tur gir daſchada Spehziba/ bett tur gir weens Deews katters
ſtrahda wiſẜas leetas eekſchan wiſẜeem. Eekſchan ick=kattru
parahdahß ẜöw tahß dahwanas tha Gharra/ par labbu tai
draudſei. Zittam tohp dohta zaur to Gharru ta Runna-
ſchana (Walloda/) no tahß Ghuddribas. Zittam tohp doh-
ta ta Runnaſchana no tahß Atſiſchanas pehtz to paſſchu
Gharru/ zittam ta Titziba eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru/ zit-
tam ta dahwana Wäſẜälu darriet eekſchan to paſſchu Ghar-
ru/ zittam Brienumus darriet/ zittam Mahziſchana/ zittam
Gharrus Jßpraſt/ zittam daſchada Mehle/ zittam tahß meh-
les Jß=ſtahſtiet. Bett ſcho wiſẜu darra tas patz weeniegs
Gharrs/ vnd ißdalla ickweenam to Dahwanu ka tam pattiek.
Evangelium am zehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Luc. 19.
KAd JEſus tuwe klaht
py Jeruſalemes nah-
ze/ vsluhkoya tas to Pili/
vnd raudaya par to/ vnnd
ẜatziya/ Kad tu to ſinnatu/
tad buhtu tu ſchinny tawà
laikà arridſan apdohma-
yuſẜi/ kas py tawu Meeru
wayadſätu. Bett nu gir
tas preekſchan taweem Atzeem paſläptz. Aiſto tas laix
par töw nahx/ ka tawi Waideneeki apkahrt töw vnd ta-
weem Bährneem ar töw/ weenu Rattapili apkahrt töw
ẜittieß/ töw apẜehdehß/ vnnd wiſẜahß mallahß ſpaidieß/
vnd töw ſkieſt iß=pohſtieß/ vnnd nhe weenu Ackmini vs
ohtru atſtahß/ tapehtz/ ka tu nhe eſẜi attſinnuſẜi to laiku/
kad tu peemäckläta eſẜi. Vnd wings ghaya Baſnizà/
vnd eeẜahka ißdſiet/ kattri tur eekſchan pahrdewe vnnd
pirrka/ vnd ẜatziya vs teems/ tur ſtahw raxtietz/ Mans
Namms gir weens Pahtaronamms/ bett juhß eſẜeeta to
par weenu ſläppkawo beddri darrijuſchi. Vnnd mah-
ziya ick Deenas Baſnizà. Bett tee Auxtibaſnizaskun-
gi vnd Raxtemahzetayi/ vnnd tee Prahwaki ſtarrpan
teem Ļaudeem/ ghadaya/ ka tee to nokautu/ vnnd nhe
attradda ka teems darrieth by. Aiſto wiſẜi Ļaudis pee-
kehrehß tam/ vnd dſirrdeya to.
Epiſtel am eilfften Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 1. Corinth. 15.
MYeļi Brahļi/ es attminnu jums to Ewangelium/ ko es
jums paſluddenayis äßmu/ kattru juhß arridſan vsjä-
muſchi eſẜeeta/ eekſchan kattru juhß arridſan ſtahweeta/
zaur kattru juhß arridſan ẜwähti tohpeeta/ ka es jums to
paſluddenayis äßmu/ ja juhß tickai to patturreyuſchi eſẜeeta/
tas warr tad buht/ ka juhß wellte buhtat titzeyuſchi. Aiſto es
äßmu jums papreekſch to dewis/ kattru es arridſan dabbuyis
äßmu/ ka CHriſtus nomirris gir muhſẜo Ghräko dehl/ pehtz
to Raxtu/ vnd ka tas apracktz gir/ vnd ka tas attkall auk-
ſcham zehleeß gir/ treſſchà Deenà/ pehtz to Raxtu. Vnd ka
tas gir rädſähtz no Keewas/ pehtz no teem Diwipaddeßmit-
teem. Pehtz gir tas rädſähtz no wairahk nhe ka peezeẜimb-
teem Brahleem weenà reiſa/ no teems paſſcheems wehl dauds
dſiewo/ bett zitti gir aismigguſchi. Pehtz gir tas rädſahtz no
Jacobu/ pehtz no wiſẜeem Apuſtuļeem. Wiß pehdige pehtz
wiſẜeems gir tas arridſan no man/ ka no kahdu nhelaizigu
dſimbtibu rädſähtz. Aiſto es äßmu tas ſämmakais no teem
Apuſtuļeem/ katters es nhe äßmu zeeniex/ ka mann par A-
puſtuli ẜautz/ tapehtz/ ka es to Deewa Draudſibu pullghayis
äßmu. Bett no Deewa ſchälaſtibas äßmu es/ kas es äßmu/
vnd winja ſchäläſtiba py mann nhe gir wellte biyuſẜi. Bett es
äßmu dauds wairahk ſtradayis/ nhe ka tee wiſẜi. Bett nhe es/
bett Deewa ſchäläſtiba/ kattra eekſchan mann gir.
Evangelium am eilfften Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Luc. 18.
JEſus ẜatziya wißwairahk vs teem/ kattri ſkittahß
taißni äſẜoſchi/ vnd nitzinaya zittus/ ſchadu liedſibu:
Diwi Zillwäki noghaya
aukſcham Baſnizà Pah-
tarus ſkaitiet/ weens by
weens Wariſeeris/ ohters
weens Muiteneex. Tas
Wariſeeris ſtahweya/ vnd
ſkaitiya py ẜöw paſſcham
tha: Es patteizu töw
Deews/ ka es nhe äßmu ka
zitti Ļaudis/ Laupitayi/ Nhetaißni/ Laulibas=pahrlau-
ſetayi/ jeb arridſan ka ſchiß Muiteneex. Es ghaweyu
diwireis nedeļà/ vnd dohmu to Deßmittu no wiſẜu kas
mann gir.
Vnd tas Muiteneex ſtahweya no tahlenes/ ney ghrib-
ghribbeya ẜawas Atzis pazellt vs Däbbäſẜu/ bett ẜitta
preekſchan ẜawu Kruhti/ vnd ſatziya: Deews eſẜi mann
Ghrehzeneekam ſchehliegs. Es ẜacku jums/ Schiß nogha-
ya ſemmeh taißnis ẜawà Nammà/ preekſch winyu. Ai-
ſto kas ẜöw patz auxtenayahß/ tas tohp ſämmohtz/ vnd
kas ẜöw patz ſämmoyahß/ tas tohp pa=auxtenahtz.
Epiſtel am zwölfften Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 2. Corinth. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi/ tada peetitziba gir mums zaur CHriſtum
py Deewu/ nhe ta/ ka mehß ko labb därram no mums
paſſcheem kahdu leetu apdohmaht/ ihten ka no mums
paſſcheem: Bett ko mehß därram/ tas gir no Deewu katters
mums arridſan zeenigus darriyis gir/ to Ammatu tahß
jaunas Eeſtadiſchanas ſtrahdaht/ nhe ta Baußla/ bett ta
Gharra. Aiſto tas Baußlis nokaw/ bett tas Gharrs darra
dſiewus.
Bett ja tam Ammatam/ katters zaur to Baußlu nokaw/
vnd eekſchan teem Ackmiņņeem eſiemohtz gir/ ſkaidriba by/ ka
tee Bährni Jſrael nhe warreya vsluhkoht to waighu Moſi/
tahß ſkaidribas dehl winya Waigha/ kattra mittahß: Ka
nhe by tad dauds wairahk tam Ammatam/ katters to Ghar-
ru dohd/ ſkaidriba buht? Aiſto ka nu tam Ammatam/ katters
to Paſuſſchanu mahza/ ſkaidriba gir/ wehl dauds wairahk
gir tam Ammatam/ katters to Taißnibu mahza/ ſpehziga
ſkaidriba.
Evangelium am zwölfften Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Marci 7. Cap.
KAd JEſus atkal ißghaya no tahm Eſcham Tyri
vnd Sydon/ nahze tas py to Galileero Juhri/ wid-
du ſtarpan tahm Eeſchahm to deßmitto Pilo. Vnnd
tee neſẜe weenu Kurrlu py to/ tas by Mähms. Vnd tee
luhdſe to/ ka tas ẜawas Rohkas vs to licktu. Vnd tas
jehme to no teem Ļaudeem
ẜawißke py mallas/ vnd li-
cka tam tohß pirrxtus Auſ-
ẜies/ vnd iß=ſplahwe/ vnnd
aiſkare winja Mehļ vnd
ſkattiyahß vs Däbbäſẜu/
nopuhtehß vnd ẜatziya vs
to: Hephetah/ tas gir/ att-
werrees. Vnnd tudeļļ att-
wehrehß winja Auſẜis/ vñ tas Ꞩaitz winja Mehles tappa
Ꞩwabbads/ vnd runnaya pareiſe. Vnd wings aißleedſe
teem/ teem nhe by to nhe weenam ẜatziet. Bett jo wings
wairahk aißleedſe/ jo tee wairahk ißpaude/ vnd brieno-
yahß parr to ļohte/ vnd ẜatziya: Tas gir wiſẜas leetas
labbe darriyis/ tohß Kurrlus gir tas dſirrdoſchus dar-
riyis/ vnd tohß Mähmus runnayoſchus.
Epiſtel am dreyzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Gal. 3.
MYļi Brahļi/ es ghribbu vs Zillwehzigu dabbu runnahtrunnaht=.
Nhe weens nitzina weena zillwäka Eeſtadiſchanu (kad
ta apſtipprenata gir) vnd nhe peeleek arridſan nhe nee-
ka. Nu gir jo ta ẜohliſchana tam Abrahamam/ vnd winja
Ꞩähklai ẜohlita. Tas nhe ẜacka/ eekſchan teem Ꞩähkleem/ ka
zaur dauds/ bett ka zaur weenu: Zaur tawu Ꞩähklu/ kat-
ters gir CHriſtus. Bett es ẜacku no to/ ta Eeſtadiſchana kat-
tra no Deewu papreekſch apſtipprenata gir/ vs CHriſtum/
nhe tohp ißdſähſta/ ka tai Ꞩohliſchanai by zaur to Baußlu
miſt/ (
alij
mittehtees/) katters dohtz gir par tſchettreẜimbteems
vnd trießdeßmitteems Ghaddeems. Aiſto ja ta Bährna Mañ-
tiba zaur to Baußlu nopellnita taptu/ tad nhe taptu ta zaur
to Ꞩohliſchanu dohta. Bett Deews gir tam Abrahamam
to zaur to Ꞩohliſchanu wellte ee=ſkiņņkoyis. Ko buhß tad tam
Baußlam? Tas gir klaht pee=nahzis to Ghräko dehļ teekam
ka ta Ꞩähkla nahktu/ tam kattram ta Ꞩohliſchana notickuſẜi
gir/ vnd gir ißtaiſẜietz no teems Engeļeems zaur to Rohku
tha Widdetaya/ bett weens Widdetais nhe gir weena wee-
niga Widdetais/ bett Deews gir weeniegs. Ka? gir tad tas
Baußlis pretty Deewa ẜohliſchanu? Tas nhe warr buht.
Bett ja kahds Baußlis buhtu dohtz/ kas warrätu dſiewus
darriet/ tad nahktu ta Taißniba pattees no to Baußlu. Bett
tas Raxtz gir wiſẜus nolitzis appackſchan teem Ghräkeem/
ka ta Ꞩohliſchana nahktu/ zaur to Titzibu eekſchan CHriſto
JEſu/ teem dohta/ kattri titz.
Evangelium am dreyzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 10.
JEſus attghreeſehß ẜöw vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem/
vnd ẜatziya itt ihpaſſch: Swähtas gir tahß Atzis/
kattras räds/ ko juhß rädſaht. Aiſto es ẜacku jums/
dauds Proweetes vnnd Koningi ghribbeya redſeht/ ko
juhß rädſaht/ vnd nhe gir redſeyuſchi/ vnd dſirrdeht/ ko
juhß dſirrdaht/ vnd nhe gir dſirrdeyuſchi.
Vnd reds/ tad zehlehß aukſcham weens Raxtamah-
zetayß/ ghribbädams to ißklauſẜiet ẜatziya: Meiſteri/ ko
buhß mann darrieth/ ka es to muhſchigu Dſiewoſcha-
nu dabbu? Bett wings ẜatziya vs to: Ka ſtahw Bauß-
ly raxtietz? Ka laſẜi tu? Tas adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya/ Töw
buhß Deewu tawu Kungu mieļoht/ no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/
no wiſẜu Dwehſẜeli/ no wiſẜu Ꞩpähku/ vnnd no wiſẜu
Prahtu/ vnnd tawu Tuwaku ka ẜöw paſſchu. Bett
wings ẜatziya vs to: Tu eſẜi pareiſe adbilldeyis/ darri to/
tad tu dſiewohſẜi.
Bett tas ghribbädams
ẜöw pattz taißnohtees/ ẜa-
tziya vs JEſu: Kas gir tad
manns Tuwakaiß? Tad
adbilldeya JEſus vnd ẜa-
tziya/ Turr by weens Zill-
wähx/ tas ißghaya no Je-
ruſalemes vs Jericho/ vnd
tam ghaddiyahß ſtarrp
Släppkaweem/ tee ißwillka to/ vnd kuhle to/ vnd gha-
ya nohſt/ vnd atſtahya to puß nomirruſchu ghulloſchu.
Bett tas lehzehß no nheyauſch/ ka weens Baßnizas=
kungs to paſſchu zeļļu ſtaighaya/ vnd kad tas nahze py
to weetu/ vnd redſeya to/ paghaya tas zätzen. Ta lieds
arridſan weens Leewietz/ kad tas nahze py to weetu/ vnd
redſeya to/ ghaya tas zätzen. Bett weens Samariters
ſtaighaya vnd nahze turr. Vnd kad tas to redſeya/ ab-
ſchäloyahß tas ẜöw par to/ vnd peeghaya py to/ ẜaſẜehya
tam winja Wahtes/ vnd lehya tam eekſchan ölye vnnd
Wienu. Vnd zehle to vs ẜawu Lohpu/ vnnd wedde to
eekſchan Mahyaweetas/ vnnd ẜarrghaja to. Ohtrà
Deenà brautze tas nohſt/ vnd ißwilka diwi Ghroſſchus/
vnd dewe tohß tam Ꞩaimneekam/ vnnd ẜatziya vs to:
Ghlabba to/ vnnd ja tu ko wairahk ißdohſẜi/ ghribbu es
töw to attmaxaht att=eedammsattee=damms. Kattru ſkeetees tu/ no
ſcheems trimms to Tuwaku äſẜam biyuſchu tam/ kat-
tram ſtarrp Släppkaweem ghaddiyahß? Tas ẜatziya/
Tas/ katters ſchälaſtibu tam darriya. Tad ẜatziya JE-
ſus vs to: Tad ey prohyam/ vnd darri tha arridſan.
Epiſtel am vierzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Gal. 5.
MYeļi Brahļi/ ſtaighayeeta eekſchan Gharru/ tad juhß
tahß Meſẜas kahribu nhe peepilldieſẜeeta. Aiſto tai
Meeſẜi ghribbahß prettie to Gharru/ vnd tam Ghar-
ram prettie to Meeſẜu. Tee paſſchi gir weens prett ohtru/ ka
juhß nhe darraht/ ko juhß ghribbaht. Bett ja jums tas
Gharrs wallda/ tad nhe eſẜeta juhß appackſchan to Bauß-
lu. Bett tee darrbi tahß Meeſẜas gir ſinnami/ ka turr gir
Laulibas Pahrkahpſchana/ Mauziba/ nheſkieſtiba/ Beßkauni-
ba/ Ällkadeewiba/ Burrwiba/ Eeneidiba/ Bahrſchana/ Ee-
niedeſchana/ Dußmiba/ Reeſchana/ Nheẜaddereſchana/ nhe-
labba Mahziba/ Nhe ee=redſeſchana/ Släppkawiba/ Pliete-
ſchana/ Ryſchana/ vnd kas ta warr buht. No kattreems es
jums papreekſch ẜatziyis äßmu/ vnd ẜacku wehl papreekſch/ ka
tee/ kattri to darra/ to Deewa Wallſtibu par Bährna mann-
tibu nhe dabbuis.
Bett tee augļi tha Gharra gir/ Myläſtiba/ Liexmiba/
Meers/ Pazeeſchana/ lehniba/ laipniba/ Titziba/ lähns=prahtz/
Skieſtiba/ prettie tahdeem nhe gir tas Baußlis. Bett kattri
CHriſto/ peedärr/ tee ſlahpina ẜawu Meeſẜu/ arr to Kahru-
mu vnd eeghribbeſchanu.
Ewangelium am vierzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 17.
VNd tas notickahß/ kad JEſus ghaya vs Jeruſale-
mes/ ſtaighaya tas widdu zaur Samaria vnnd
Galilea. Vnd kad wings
weenà Jällghawà nahze/
ẜattappa winjam deßmittz
Spittaligi Wieri/ tee ſtah-
weya no tahļenes/ pazäll-
dami ẜawus Ballxnes ſa-
tziya: JEſu/ myļais Mei-
ſteri/ abſchäloyees töw par
mums. Vnnd kad wings
tohß redſeya/ ẜatziya wings vs teem: No eyta/ vnd rah-
daitees teem Baßnizaskungeem. Vnnd tas notickahß
kad tee noghaya/ tappa tee ſkieſti.
Bett weens no teem/ rädſädams/ ka tas by wäſ-
ẜäls tappis/ attghreeſehß tas attkal apkahrt/ vnnd teitze
Deewu/ ar ſkannigu ballxni/ vnd kritta vs ẜawu Wai-
gu/ py winja kahyeemah/ vnd patteitze winjam. Vnnd
tas by weens Samariters. Bett JEſus adbilldeya vnd
ẜatziya/ Nhegg gir turr deßmittz ſkieſti tappuſchi? Bett
kur gir tee dehwingi? Nhe gir tad zittz nhe weens attrahſts/
katters attkal attghreeſtohß/ vnd dohtu Deewam Ghoh-
du/ ka weens ſchis Ꞩweſſcheneex? Vnd wings ẜatziya
vs to: zellees aukſcham/ ey prohyam/ tawa Titziba gir
töw palliedſeyuſẜi.
Epiſtel am funffzehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Gal. 6.
MYeļi Brahļi/ ja mehß eekſchan Gharru dſiewoyam/
tad laideeta mums arridſan eekſchan Gharru ſtai-
ghaht. Nhe laideeta mums pehtz to neezigu Ghohdu
kahrotees/ neds dußmotees muhſẜo ſtarrpà/ neds eeniedeh-
tees. Myļi Brahļi/ ja kahds Zillwähx no kahdas wainas
pahrſteicktz tohp/ tad palliedſeeta tam attkal ar lehnprahtigu
Gharru/ juhß kattri juhß Gharrigi eſẜeeta. Vnd luhkoyees
vs ẜöw paſſchu/ ka tu arridſan nhe tohpi kahrdenahtz. Weens
laid pannäß ohtra Naßtu/ tad juhß to Baußlu CHriſti pee-
pilldieeſẜeta. Bett ja kaßlabba domatu/ täs äſẜohtz kas/ vnd
tas tomähr nhe gir nheneeka/ tas peewiļļahß ẜöw pattz. Bett
ickweens laid luhko vs ẜawu paſſchu darrbu/ vnnd tad buhß
tam py ẜöw paſſcham Ghohds/ vnd nhe py zittu. Aiſto ick
weens ẜawu Naßtu neſẜies.
Bett tas kas pamahzietz tohp ar to Wahrdu/ tam buhß
ißdallieth wiſẜu labbumu tam kas to pamahza. Nhe alloyee-
tees/ Deews nhe leekahß apſmeetees. Aiſto ko tas Zillwähx
ẜeh/ to tas pļaws. Kas vs to Meeſẜu ẜeh/ tas no to Meeſẜu to
ẜamaitaſchanu pļaws. Bett kas vs to Gharru ẜeh/ tas no to
Gharru to muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu pļaws. Bett laideeta
mums labbe darriet/ vnd nhe peekuſt. Aiſto ẜawà laikà mehß

nach Trinitatis/ Matth. 6.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teem Ļaudeem: Nhe weens nhe

MYļi Brahļi/ es luhdſu/ ka juhß nhe peekuhſtaht/ maño

THa Koninja Ꞩullainis by/ tha Dähls ghulleya

ka tas noſtaighatu/ vnd
palliedſähtu winja Däh-
lam. Aiſto tas by ihß tay
Nawei nhewäſẜäls. Vnd
JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Ja
juhß Siemes vnd Brynu-

atſtahya tas Draudſis. Tad nomanniya tas Tähws/
ap to ſtundu äſẜam/ kad JESVS ẜatziya vs to/ Taws

Ta gir nu ohtra Syme/ kattru JEſus darriya/ nahk-
dams no Judea eekſchan Galileà.
Epiſtel am zwey=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Philipp. 1.
MYļi Braļi/ Es patteitzu mannam Deewam/ zeekahrt es
juhſẜo peeminu (kattru es allaſch darru/ wiſẜohß man-
nohß Patarohß par jums wiſẜeem/ vnd darru tohß Pa-
tarus ar Lyxmibu) par juhſẜu Draudſibu py to Ewangelio/
no pirrmahß Deenas ihß ſcho. Vnd äßmu labba zerribà/ ka
tas/ katters eekſchan jums eeẜahzis gir to labbu darrbu/ tas
to arridſan pabeix/ ihß tai Deeny JEſu CHriſti/ ka man
tad peedärr/ tha no jums wiſẜeems zerreht/ Tapehts ka es
jums mannà Ꞩirdy turru/ ſchinni mannà zeetumà/ kur es
to Ewangelium aißbilldu/ vnnd apſtippru/ ka juhß wiſẜi ar
man to ſchälaſtibu dabbuyuſchi eſẜeeta.
Aiſto Deews gir mans Leezeneex/ ka mannai Ꞩirrdei
ſchäle gir pehts jums ekſchan JEſu CHriſto/ vnnd par to
luhdſcho es/ ka juhſẜa myleſtiba jo Deenas jo wairahk bag-
gata tohp/ wiſẜenadà atſiſchanà vnd ẜajuſẜchanà/ ka juhß bau-
dyht warraht/ kas labbahx gir/ ka juhß tyre vnnd nhe pee-
dauſighi eſẜeeta ihß tai Deeny CHriſti/ peepillditi ar au-
gļeems tahß Taißnibas/ kattra zaur JEſum CHriſtum no-
tikuſẜi gir (eekſchan jums) Deewam par Ghodu vnd Ꞩlawu.
Evangelium am 22. Sontage nach Trini-
nitatis/ Matth. 18.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Ta Däb-
bäſẜo=wallſtiba gir liedſa weenam Koninjam/ katters
ar ẜaweems Kallpeems laghadiet gribbeya. Vnnd kad
tas eeẜahka laghadiet/ nahze tam weens preekſchan/ tas
by tam deßmitz tuhxtoſchus Pohdus parrada. Kad tas
nu nhe=ſpehya to maxaht/ pawehleya tas Kungs par-
doht ẜöw/ ẜawu Ꞩeewu/ vnd ẜawus Bährnus/ vnd wis
kas tam by/ vnd maxaht. Tad kritta tas Kallps ſemme/
vnd peeluhdſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/ Kungs/ eſẜi ar man ar
Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Tad by tam
Kungham ſchäl ta Kallpa/ vnd palaide to/ vnnd to
Parradu atlaide tas tam arridſan.
Tad ißghaya tas patz
Kallps ara/ vnd attradda
weenu no ẜaweem Beedra=
kallpeem/ tas by tam ẜimb-
tus Groſſchus parrada.
Vnd tas ẜakampe to/ vnd
ſchņaudſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/
maxa man/ ko tu man par-
rada eſẜi. Tad kritta winja
Beedrakallps ſemme/ vnd luhdſe to/ vnd ẜatziya/ Eſẜi ar
man ar Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Bett
wings nhe gribbeya/ vnd noghaya/ vnd mette to zeetu-
mà/ teekams tas maxaya/ ko tas parrada by.
Bett kad winja Beedrakallpi ſchahß leetas redſeya/
tappa tee ļohte noſkummuſchi/ nahze vnd paſẜatziya ẜa-
wam Kungam/ wiß kas by notitzis. Tad aitzenaya to
winja Kungs preekſch ẜöw/ vnd ẜatziya vs to: Tu bleh-
dygs Kallps/ wiſẜu ſcho Parradu äßmu es töw attlai-
dis/ kad tu man luhdſi/ nhe by töw tad arridſan abſchä-
lotees/ par tawu Beedrakallpu/ ka es ẜöw par töw ab-
ſchäloyohß? Vnd winja Kungs apſkaita/ vnd nodewe
to teem Mohzetayeem/ teekams tas maxatu wiß ko tas
tam by parrada. Tha jums mans Däbbäſẜo Tähws
arridſan darrys/ ja juhß nhe peedohſẜeeta no juhſẜeems
Ꞩirrdeems ick weens ẜawam Brahļam ẜawu Wainu.
(ẜawus Grähkus.)
Epiſtel am 23. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
Philipp. 3.
MYļi Braļi/ ſtaigayeeta man pehts/ vnd lukoyeeta vs
teems/ kattri ta ſtaiga/ ka mehß jums äſẜam par Preek-
ſche Siem. Aiſto dauds ſtaiga/ no kattreems es jums
daſche kahrt äßmu ẜatziyis/ bett nu ẜacku es jums arridſan
raudadams/ tee Eenaidneeki ta Kruſta CHriſti/ kattro Galls
gir ta Paſuſſchana/ kattro Deews tas Wähdärs gir/ vnnd
kattro Ghohds kannà tohp/ tho/ kattri ſemmiſchke dohma.
Bett muhſẜa dſiewoſchana gir Debbeſẜihß/ no kurrenes
mehß arridſan ghaidam to Peſtitayu JEſum CHriſtum to
Kungu. Katters muhſẜu neezigu Meeſẜu apſkaidrohß/ ka ta
liedſäna kļuhſt ẜawai apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi/ pehts to darrbu/
ar kattru wings arridſan war wiſẜas leetas ẜöw paklauſẜi-
gus darriet.
Evangelium am 23. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 22.
TAd nogaya tee Wariſeeri/ vnd turreya Runnas/
(ẜarunnayahß/) ka tee JEſum ẜawà Wallodà ẜa-
yämtu. Vnd ẜuhtiya py to ẜawus Mahzekļus/ ar Hero-
dis Ꞩullaineems/ vnd ẜatziya/ Meiſter/ mehß ſinnam ka
tu taißnis eſẜi/ vnd mahzi to Deewa zeļļu teeſcham/ vnd
tu nhe bähda pehtz nheweenu/ Aiſto tu nhe ohla to Vs-
luhkoſchanu tho Zillwäko. Tapehtz ẜacki mums/ ko
ſkeet tu/ girahk tas pareiſe/ ka mehß tam Keiſeŗam Noh-
mu dohdam/ jeb nhe? Kad
nu JEſus winjo blehdibu
nomanniya/ ẜatziya tas:
Juhß Willtineeki/ ko iß-
klauſẜaita juhß mann? Ra-
daita mann ſchurr to Noh-
makauſẜu. Vnd tee parah-
diya tham weenu Ghroſẜi.
Vnd wings ẜatziya vs teem:
Ka Syhme gir tha/ vnnd tas Wirſẜoraxtz? Tee ẜatziya
vs winju: Ta Keyſeŗa. Tad ẜatziya wings vs teem:
Tad dohdeeta tam Keyſeŗam/ kas tam Keyſeŗam pee-
därr/ vnd Deewam kas Deewam peedärr. Kad tee to
dſirrdeya/ iſẜabrienoyahß tee/ vnnd atſtahya to/ vnd
ghaya nohſt.
Epiſtel am 24. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
Coloſſ. 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ Mehß nhe mittam par jums luhkt/ ka juhß
peepillditi tohpat/ ar Atſiſchanu Deewa prahta/ eek-
ſchan wiſẜas gharrigas ghuddribas vnnd ẜappraſſcha-
nas/ ka juhß ſtaighayeeta zeenige tam Kungam pa wiſẜam
prahtam. Vnnd aughligi eſẜeeta eekſchan wiſẜeem labbeem
darrbeem/ vnd aughaita eekſchan Deewa atſiſchanas/ vnnd
eeſtipprenati tohpeeta ar wiſẜenadu Warru/ pehtz winja ghoh-
digu ſpähku/ eekſchan wiſẜenadas pazeeſchanas/ vnnd lehn-
prahtibas/ ar Liexmibu/ vnnd patteizibu ẜackam tam Täh-
wam/ kas mums derrigus darriyis gir/ py tahß Bährna
manntibas to Ꞩwähto eekſchan ghaiſchumas. Katters
mums peſtiyis gir/ no to Spähku tahß Tumbſẜibas/ vnd gir
mums pahrſtattiyis eekſchan tahß Wallſtibas ẜawa mieļa
Dähla/ py kattru mums gir ta Peſtiſchana zaur ẜawu Aſẜi-
ni/ ar wahrdu ta Peedoſchana to Ghräko.
Evangelium am 24. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 9.
KAd JEſus runnaya ar Jaņa Mahzekļeem/ rau-
gi/ tad nahze weens no teem Wirſẜeneekeem/ vnnd
kritta preekſchan to ſemme/
vnd ẜatziya/ Kungs/ man-
na Meitha gir taggadien
nomirruſẜi/ bett nahz/ vnd
vsleetz ẜawu Rohku vs
tahß/ tad taps tha dſiewa.
JEſus zehlehß aukſcham/
vnd ſtaighaya tam packaļ/
vnd winja Mahzekļi. Vnd
raugi/ weena Ꞩeewa/ kattra diwipaddeßmitt ghaddus
Aſẜinsẜährgà by ghulleyuſẜi/ ghaya attpackaļļ py to/ vnd
aißkahre winja drehbes Wiehl. Aiſto ta ẜatziya py ẜöw
paſſchu/ warrätu es ween winja Drehbes Wiel aiß-
kahrt/ tad taptu es Wäſẜäla. Tad attgreſehß JEſus
apkahrt/ vnd vsluhkoya to/ vnd ſatziya: Turrais lab-
bu prahtu manna Meita/ tawa Titziba gir töw pallie-
dſeyuſẜi. Vnd ta Ꞩeewa tappa Wäſẜäla tanny paſſchà
ſtundà.
Vnd kad wings tha Wirrſẜeneeka Nammà nahze/
vnd redſeya tohß Stabbulneekus/ vnd to Trohxne to
Ļauſcho/ ẜatziya wings vs teems/ Attkahpeetees/ aiſto
ta Meitinya nhe gir nomirruſẜi/ bett ta ghull. Vnd tee
apſmehya winju. Bett kad tee Ļaudis ißdſieti by/ ghaya
wings eekſcha/ vnd ẜathwere to py Rohkas. Tad zeh-
lehß ta Meitinya aukſcham. Vnd ta Ꞩlawa ißpauda
par to paſſchu wiſẜu Semm.
Epiſtel am 25. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
1. Theſſ. 4.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Mehß nhe ghribbam jums ſlehpt/ no
teems kattri aiſmigguſchi gir/ ka juhß nhe eſẜeeta noſkum-
muſchi/ ka zitti/ kattreems zerriba nhe gir. Aiſto ja mehß
titzam/ ka JEſus nomirris/ vnd attkal aukſcham zehlees gir/
ihten ta arridſan Deews/ tohß/ kattri aismigguſchi gir/ zaur
JEſum/ ar to weddies.
Aiſto to ẜackam mehß jums/ ka weenu wahrdu tha
Kungha/ ka mehß/ kattri mehß dſiewoyam/ vnd attleekam/
kad tas Kungs attnahx/ teems nhe nahxim preekſchan/ kat-
tri aiſmigguſchi gir/ aiſto tas Kungs patz ar weenu Kleekſchanu
vnd Ballxni tha ihſtäna Engeļa/ vnd ar to Deewa Baſuni
ſcheit ſemmeh nahx no Däbbäſẜu. Vnd tee Mirroni eekſchan
CHriſto/ pirrmahk attkal aukſcham zelſẜees/ tad pehtz/ kat-
tri mehß dſiewoyam/ vnd attleekam/ tapſẜim lieds ar teems
paſſcheems norauti eekſchan teem Paddebbeſẜeem/ tam Kun-
gham prettie ghaiſẜà/ vnd ta buhſẜim mehß py to Kunghu
allaſchien. Ta eeliexmoyeetees ẜöw nu ar ẜcheem Wahrdeem
ẜawà ſtarrpà.
Evangelium am 25. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 24.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Kad juhß
nu redſeſẜeeta to nhe ghanntibu tahß ißpohſtiſcha-
nas/ no kattru ẜatzietz gir zaur to Proweetu Daniel/ ka
tas ſtahw eekſchan to ẜwähtu weetu/ kas to laſẜa/ tam
buhß to labb abdohmaht. Tad laid bähg wirſẜon teem
Kallneem/ kas Juddo=Semmeh gir/ vnd kas wirs
Jumbtu gir/ tas laid nhe kahp ſemmeh/ ko labb no ẜawu
Nammu attneſteeß. Vnd kas wirrs Lauku gir/ tas laid
nhe attghreeſchahß ẜawas
Drehbes attneßtees. Bett
wai teem apgruhtenateem/
vnd Sieſchameem tanny
laikà. Bett luhdſeeta ka juhſ-
ẜakajuhſẜa behkſchana nhe lätzahß
Seemà jeb Ꞩwehdeenà/ ai-
ſto tad tahdas leelas bäh-
das buhß/ ka nhe gir biyu-
ẜchi no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules/ ihß ſchim/ vnd ka ar-
ridſan wairs nhe buhß. Vnd ja ẜchahß Deenas nhe tap-
tu pa=ihſẜenatas/ tad nhe taptu nhe weens Zillwähx
ẜwähtz. Bett to Jßrädſäto dehļ tohp tahß Deenas pa=
iſẜenatas.
Ja tad kaßlabban vs jums ẜatzies/ Redſeeta/ ſcheit
gir CHriſtus/ jeb tur/ tad nhe buhß jums to titzeht/ aiſto
nhe vstitzami CHriſti/ vnd nhe=vstitzami Proweetes
ißdohſẜees/ vnd leelas Siemes vnd brienumus darris/
ka arridſan tee ißrädſäti (ja tas tha warrätu buht) leelà
peewillſchanà peewillti taptu. Redſeeta/ es äßmu
jums to papreekſch ẜatziyis. Tapehtz/ kad tee vs jums
ẜatzies/ redſeeta/ tas gir Tuxneſẜy/ tad nhe eita aran/ red-
ſeeta/ tas gir Kambary/ tad nhe titzaht. Aiſto ihten ka
tas Sibbänes ißlätz no Rieta puſẜes/ vnd attſpied ihß
Wackara puſẜes/ ta buhß arridſan ta Attnahkſchana
tha zillwäka Dähla. Aiſto kurr Maita gir/ turr ẜa-
ckrahyahß tee Ehrgļi.
Epiſtel am 26. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
2. Petr. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi/ ſinnaita to papreekſch/ ka eekſchan pehdi-
gahm Deenahm nahx Ꞩmehyehyi/ kattru pehtz ẜawu
paſſchu Prahtu dſiewohß/ vnd ẜatzies/ Kur gir ta ẜoh-
liſchana winja (Deewa) atnahkſchanas? Aiſto pehtz to ka tee
Tähwi aismigguſchi gir/ palleck wiſẜas leetas/ ta ka tahß no
Eeẜakumu tahß Raddibas bijuſchas gir. Bett nhe ghribbä-
dammi nhe ghribb tee ſinnaht/ ka ta Debbes pirrmayohß
laikohß arridſan by/ ta lieds arridſan ta Semme/ no Vdeni
vnd eekſchan Vdeni biyuſẜi zaur Deewa Wahrdu/ vnd to-
mähr tappa tanny laikà ta Paſẜaule zaur teem paſſcheem ar
to Vdens ghräku (zaur to wahrdu vnd Vdeni.) ẜamaitata.
Ta arridſan ta Debbes/ kattra taggad gir/ vnd ta Semme/
tohp zaur winja Wahrdu ẜaudẜäta/ ka tee tam Vggunim paſ-
ẜarghati tohp/ py to Deenu tahß Ꞩohdibas/ vnd py paſu-
denaſchanas to behßdeewigo Zillwäko. Bett weenai leetai nhe
buhß jums paẜlähptai buht/ juhß mieligi/ ka weena Deena
preekſchan to Kungu gir ka tuhxtoſchi ghaddi/ vnd tuhxtoſchi
ghaddi ka weena Deena. Tas Kungs nhe kawe to Ꞩohliſcha-
na/ ka daſchi to weenu kaweſchanu ſkeet/ bett tas gir lehniegs
ar mums/ vnnd nhe ghribb/ ka kamlabban buhß paſuſtam
tapt/ bett ka ick=kattris no Ghräkeems attſtahyahß.
Bett ta Deena ta Kunga nahx/ ka kahds Sagglis nackty/
eekſchan kattru tahß Debbeſẜes ißniex/ ar leelu brackſchkeſcha-
nu/ bett tee Eẜakumi no karrſtamu ißkuſẜies/ vnd ta Semme/
vnd tee Darrbi/ kattri tur eekſchan gir/ taps ẜadädſenati.
Kad nu tam ta wiſẜam buhß ißniekt/ ka buhß jums tad
ẜattaiſẜitees? Ar ẜwätu dſiewoſchanu vnd buhſchanu kattra
Deewam patiek/ ka juhß ghaidaht vnd ſteidſatees vs to nha-
koſchu Deenu ta Kunga/ kad tahß Debbeſẜes ar Vgguni iß-
niex/ vnnd tee Eeẜakumi no karrſtumu ißkuſẜies. Bett mehß
ẜaghaidam weenu jaunu Debbes/ vnd weenu jaunu Semm/
ka wings ẜohliyis gir/ eekſchan kattras Taißniba dſiewo.
Evangelium am 26. Sontage nach Trini-
nitatis/ Matth. 25.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem mahzekļeem: Kad ta Zill-
wäka Dähls nahx eekſchan ẜawas Ghodibas/ vnd
wiſẜi Engeļi ar to/ tad tas
ẜehdehß vs to Krähßlu ẜa-
was Ghodibas/ vnnd wiſẜi
Ļaudis taps preekſchan to
ẜakrahti/ vnd wings tohß
noſkirrß ihten ka kahds
Ghanns tahß Ahwis no
teems Ahſcheems noſkiŗŗ/
vnd tahß Ahwis taps pa
winja labbas Rohkas licktas/ bett tee Ahſchi pa kreiſẜas
Rohkas. Tad tas Konings ẜatzies vs teem pa ẜawas
labbas Rohkas: Nahzeeta ſchurr/ juhß ſwehtiti man-
na Tähwa/ eemanntoyeeta to Wallſtibu/ kattra jums
ẜattaiſẜita gir no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules. Aiſto es
äßmu ißaltzis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann pee=ähdena-
yuſchi/ es äßmu ißtwiezis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann
dſirrdinayuſchi/ es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta
mann mayoyuſchi/ es äßmu plix biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta
mann aptährpuſchi/ es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnnd zeetu-
mà biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta py mann nahkuſchi.
Tad tam tee Taißni adbilldehß/ vnd ẜatzies/ Kungs/
kad áſẜam mehß töw ißallkuſchu redſeyuſchi/ vnd äſẜam
töw pee=ähdenayuſchi? Jeb ißtwiekuſchu/ vnnd äſẜam
töw dſirrdinayuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw parr Weeſẜi
redſeyuſchi/ vnd mahyoyuſchi? Jeb plicku/ vnnd äſẜam
töw aptährpuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw nhewäſẜälu
jeb zeetumà redſeyuſchi/ vnnd äſẜam py töw nahkuſchi?
Vnd tas Konings adbilldehß/ vnd vs teem ẜatzies/ Pat-
tees/ es ẜacku jums/ ko juhß eſẜeeta darriyuſchi weenam
no ſcheem manneems wißmaſakayeem Brahļeem/ to
eſẜeeta juhß mann darriyuſchi.
Tad wings arridſan ẜatzies vs teem/ pa kreiſẜas Roh-
kas: Eita nohſt no mann juhß nolahdäti eekſchan to
muhſchigu Vgguni/ katters tur ẜataiſẜietz gir tam Wäl-
lam/ vnnd ẜaweem Engeļeem. Es äßmu ißallzis biyis/
vnnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta man peeähdenayuſchi/ es äßmu
ißtwiezis biyis/ vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann dſirrdinayu-
ſchi/ es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis/ vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann
mahyoyuſchi/ es äßmu plix biyis/ vnnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta
mann aptährpuſchi/ Es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnd Zeetu-
mà biyis/ vnnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta mann apraudſiyuſchi.
Tad tee arridſan adbilldehs/ vnnd ẜatzies/ Kungs/ kad
äſẜam mehs töw redſeyuſchi ißallkuſchu/ jeb ißtwieku-
ſchu/ jeb Weeſẜi/ jeb plicku/ jeb Nhewäſẜälu/ jeb zeetumà/
vnd nhe äſẜam töw kallpoyuſchi? Tad wings adbilldehß
vnd ẜatzies/ Pattees es ẜacku jums/ ko juhß nhe eſẜeeta
darriyuſchi/ weenam no ſcheem wißmaſakayeem/ to nhe
eſẜeeta juhß mann arridſan darriyuſchi. Vnnd tee ees
eekſchan tahß muhſchigas mohzibas/ bett tee Taißni
eekſchan tahß muhſchigas dſiewoſchanas.
Epiſtel am 27. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
2. Petr. 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ es nhe ghribbu miſt/ jums allaſchien att-
minneht/ ka juhß to ſinnahtſinnnaht/ vnd eeſtipprenahti eſẜee-
ta eekſchan tahs preekſchabuhdamas taißnibas. Aiſto
es ſkeetohs pareiſe darram/ tick illge ka es ẜchinny Buhdà
äßmu/ juhs vsmodenaht/ vnnd peemineht. Aiſto es ſinnu/
ka es ẜawu buhdu dries attſtahſchu/ ka mann to arridſan
muſẜo Kungs JEſus Chriſtus gir ſinnamu darriyis. Bett
es ghribbu ta ſtrahdaht/ ka juhs wiſẜur to warreeta kad es
buhſſchu no jums attſtahyis/ peeminnädami patturreht.
Aiſto mehß nhe äſẜam klauſẜiyuſchi tohß Ghuddrus Paſẜa-
ckus/ kad mehß jums lickam ſinnaht to Spähku vnnd to Att-
nahkſchanu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti/ bett mehß äſẜam
winja Ghohdibu paſſchi redſeyuſchi/ kad wings dabbuya no
Deewu to Tähwu/ Ghohdu vnd Ꞩlawu/ zaur weenu ballx-
ni/ kattra winjam/ noticka/ no tahß leelas Ghohdibas/ ar
Wahrdu: Ꞩchiß gir manns mieļais Dähls/ py kattru mann
labbs Prahtz girPrahtzgir. Vnnd ſcho Ballxni äſẜam mehß dſirrde-
yuſchi no Däbbäſẜu attnäſtu/ kad mehß ar to biyam/ wirs
to ẜwähtu Kallnu.
Evangelium am 27. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis Matth. 17.
PEhtz ẜeſſcham Deenahm jehme JEſus py ẜöw Pe-
teri vnd Jäcobu/ vnd Jahni winja Brahli/ vnd
wedde tohß ẜawißke vs weenu auxtu Kallnu/ vnd tappa
winjeem rädſoht apſkaidrohtz. Vnd winja Waigs ſpie-
deya ka ta Ꞩaule/ vnd winja Drehbes tappa balltas/
ka ta Ghaißma. Vnd redſi/ tad paradiyahß teem Mo-
ſes vnd Elias/ tee runnaya ar winju. Bett Peteris ad-
billdeya vñ ẜatziya vs JEſu/
Kungs ſcheit gir labba buh-
ſchana/ ghribbi tu/ tad ghrib-
bam mehß ſcheit tries Buh-
das darriet/ weenu preekſch
töw/ Moſi ohtru/ vnd Elia
treſſchu. Kad tas wehl ta
runnaya/ redſi/ tad pahrſpie-
dehya tohß weena ſpohſcha Padebbes/ vnd reds/ weena
Ballxne no tahß Padebbes ẜatziya/ Ꞩchis gir manns
myļais Dähls/ py kattru mann labbs Prahtz gir/ to
buhß jums klauſẜiet. Kad to tee Mahzekļi dſirrdeya/
kritta tee vs ẜawu Waigu/ vnd iſẜabiyayahß ļohte. Bett
JEſus ghaya py teem/ aiſkahre tohß/ vnd ẜatziya/ zellee-
tees aukſcham/ vnd nhe iſẜabieſtatees.
Bett kad tee ẜawas Atzis pazehle/ nhe redſeya tee nhe
weenu/ ka JEſum ween. Vnd kad tee no to Kallnu ſem-
meh ghaiya/ aißleedſe teem JEſus/ vnd ſatziya/ jums
nhe buhß to ko juhß eſẜeeta redſeyuſchi/ nheweenam ẜa-
tziet/ teekams ka ta Zillwäka Dähls no teem Mirroņeem
atkal aukſcham zehlees gir.
Folgen etliche Lettiſche
Epiſteln vnd Evangelia auff die fürnehmſte
Feſte im Jahr.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Andreae/
Rom. 10.
MJeļi Braļi/ ja kaßlabb no Ꞩirds titz/ tas tohp
taißnohtz/ vnd ja kaßlabb ar Mutt ißẜacka/
tas tohp ſwähtz. Aiſto tas Raxtz ẜacka/ kas
vs to titz/ tas nhe taps kaunà. Ꞩcheitan nhe
gir ẜawahds Juddis/ ẜawahds Ghreekis/ To
wiſẜo gir weens Kungs/ bagghadtz par wiſ-
ẜeem kattri to peeẜautz. Aiſto kas to Wahrdu
tha Kunga peeẜaux/ tam buhß ẜwähtam tapttaht. Bett ka buhß
teem peeẜaukt/ vs ko tee nhe titz? Bett ka buhß teem titzeht/
no kattru tee nhe gir nheneeka dſirrdeyuſchi? Bett ka buhß
teem dſirrdeht/ bes Mahzetayeem? Bett ka buhß teem mah-
ziet/ ja tee nhe tohp ẜuhtiti? Ka tad raxtietz ſtahw/ ka jaukas
Kahyas gir teem kattri to Meeru paſluddena/ kattri to lab-
bumu paſluddena. Bett tee nhe gir wiſẜi tam Ewangelio pa-
klauſẜigi/ Aiſto Eſaias ẜacka: Kungs kas titz muhſẜai Mahzi-
bai? Tad nahk ta Titziba no tahs Mahzibas/ bett ta Mahzi-
ba no to Deewa Wahrdu. Bett es ẜacku: Negg gir tee to
dſirrdeyuſchi? Pattees zaur wiſẜu ſemm gir winja ballxnis
ißghayis/ vnd wiſẜà Paſẜauleh winjo Wahrds.
Evangelium am Tage S. Andreae/
Matth. 4.
JEſus ſtaighadams py to Galileeŗo Juhri/ eeraud-
ſiya diwi Brahļus/ Simoni/ katters noẜauktz gir
Peteris/ vnd Andres ẜawu Brahļi/ tee eemette ẜawu
Tieklu Juhry/ aiſto tee by Sweineeki. Vnd wings ẜatzi-
ya vs teem: Nahzeeta packaļ mann/ es ghribbu jums
par Zillwäko Sweineekus darriet. Dries attſtahya tee
ẜawus Tieklus/ vnd ghaya packaļ winju. Vnd no ten-
nenes tahļahk eedams/ eeraudſiya wings zittus di-
wi Brahļus/ Jäcobu/ to Dählu Zebedei/ vnd Jahni
ẜawu Brahli/ Laiwà ar ẜawu Tähwu Zebedeo/ ẜawus
Tieklus lahpoht. Vnd wings ẜautze tohß: Tudeļļ att-
ſtahya tee to Laiwu vnd ẜawu Tähwu/ vnd ghaya
packaļļ winju.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Tohmae/
Epheſ. 1.
SLahwähtz gir Deews vnd tas Tähws muhſẜa Kunga
JEſu CHriſti/ katters mums ẜwehtiyis gir ar daſchadu
gharrigu Ꞩwehtibu/ eekſchan Debbeſkigeem Dahwa-
neem/ zaur Chriſtum/ ka wings mums arridſan ißwehleyis
gir zaur to paſſchu/ pirms tai Paſẜaulei tas dibbins licktz tap-
pa/ ka mums by ẜwähteems buht vnd nhe peemettigheem
preekſcha winju eekſchan tahß miläſtibas. Vnd gir mums vs-
jehmis par Behrneems ẜöw paſſcham/ zaur JEſum CHri-
ſtum/ ka winya Prahtam pattitzis gir/ par Ghohdu ẜawai
krahßnai ſchäläſtibai/ zaur kattru wings mums peejemmi-
gus darriyis gir/ eekſchan to mieligu.
Evangelium am Tage S. Thomae/
Joh. 20.
vide Dnic. Quaſimodogeniti.
Epiſtel am Tage Pauli Bekehrung/
Act. 9. Cap.
SAulus ẜchņahze wehl draudädams vnd kaudams/ pret-
tie teem Mahzekļeem ta Kunga. Vnd ghaya py Auxtu=
baſnizaskungu/ vnd luhdſe tam Ghramatas vs Da-
maſco py teem Skohlneekeem/ ja tas kahdus vs to paſſchu
zeļļu attraſtu Wierus vnd Ꞩeewas/ wings tohß ẜaſẜeetus
wäßtu vs Jeruſalemes. Vnd kad wings vs zeļļu by/ vnd tu-
we py Damaſco nahze/ apſpiedeya winju peepehſch weena
Ghaißma no Däbbäſẜu/ vnd kritta py Semmes/ vnd dſirr-
deya weenu ballxni/ ta ẜatziya vs winju/ Saul/ Saul/ ko tu
mann prettieprittie ſtahwi? Bett wings ẜatziya: Kungs/ kas eſẜi
tu? Tas Kungs ẜatziya/ Es äßmo JEſus/ kattram tu pret-
tie ſtahw. Töw ghruht nahxees prettie Ꞩkähpu ẜpahrdiet.
Vnnd wings ẜatziya trieſẜädams vnd biedams/ Kungs/ ko
ghribbi tu/ ko mann buhß darriet? Tas Kungs ẜatziya vs
winju: Zellees aukſcham/ vnd ee=ey Pily/ Teitan töw ẜatzies/
ko töw buhß darriet.
Bett tee Wieri/ kattri winja zeļļaļaudis by/ ſtahweya
vnnd by pahrbiyuſchees/ Aiſto tee dſirrdeya weenu ballxni/
vnd nhe redſeya nhe weenu. Bett Saulus zehlehß aukſcham
no Semmes/ vnnd pazälldams ẜawas Atzis/ nhe redſeya
wings nhe weenu. Bett tee jehme winju py Rohkas/ vnnd
wedde to vs Damaſco/ vnd nhe warreya trieyaß Deenahs
redſeht/ ney ähßdams/ ney dſärrdams.
Bett weens Mahzeklis by eekſchan Damaſco/ ar wahr-
du Ananias/ vs to ẜatziya tas Kungs zaur ghiemi: Anania/
vnd wings ẜatziya/ Ꞩcheitan äßmo es Kungs. Tas Kungs
ẜatziya vs winju/ zellees aukſcham/ vnnd ey eekſchan to Eelu/
kattru ẜautz to Taißnu/ vnd waiza eekſchan to Nammu Ju-
da pehtz Saulu/ ar Wahrdu no Tarſen/ Aiſto jemm währa/
wings ſkaita Patarus/ vnd gir redſeyis Ghiemy weenu Wie-
ru/ ar wahrdu Ananias/ py ẜöw nahkam/ vnd to Rohku vs
winju leekam/ ka wings attkall redſiegs tohp.
Bett Ananias adbilldeya/ Kungs/ es äßmu no daudſeem
dſirrdeyis no ſcho Wieru/ ka tas dauds nhelaimes taweem
ſwäh-
ſwähteem darriyis gir Jeruſalehmeh/ vnnd tam gir ſcheitan
waļļa no teem Auxteem Baßnizaskungheems/ ẜaiſtiet wiſẜus
kattri tawu Wahrdu peeẜautz. Tas Kungs ẜatziya vs winju:
Ey prohyam/ Aiſto ſchis gir mann weens ißrädſähtz amma-
tariex/ ka tas mannu Wahrdu näs preekſchan teem Pagga-
ņeem/ vnd preekſchan teem Koninyeem/ vnd preekſchan teem
Bährneem no Jſrael/ Es ghrihbu tam radiet/ ka dauds tam
manna Wahrda dehl zeeſt buhß. Vnd Ananias noghaya vnd
nahze tanny Nammà/ vnd licka tahß Rohkas vs winju/ vnd
ẜatziya: Mieļais Brahli Saul/ tas Kungs gir mann ẜuhti-
yis/ kas töw parahdiyees gir vs zeļļu/ ſchurp nahkoht/ ka tu
attkal redſiegs/ vnd ar to ſwähtu Gharru pepilldietz tohpi.
Vnd tudeļļ nokritta tas no winja Atzihms ka ſwieņi/ vnd
tappa attkal redſiegs. Vnd zehlehß aukſcham/ lickahß ẜöw
Chriſtitees vnd jehme Barribu py ẜöw/ vnd attſpirrghahß.
Bett Saulus by daſchu Deenu py teem Mahzekļeem
eekſchan Damaſco/ vnd tudeļļ mahziya wings no CHriſto
eekſchan Skohlahms/ ka tas patz äſẜohtz Deewa Dähls. Bett
tee wiſẜi iſẜabiyayahß/ kattri to dſirrdeya vnd ẜatziya: Negg
gir tas kas eekſchan Jeruſalem ißpohſtiya wiſẜus/ kattri ſcho
Wahrdu peeẜautze/ vnd tapehtz attnahzis/ ka tas tohß ẜaẜai-
ſtitus wäſtu py teem auxteem Baſnizaskungeem? Bett
Paulus tappa jo wairahk ſtiprahx/ vnd eerunnaya tohß
Juddus/ kattri eekſchan Damaſco dſiewoya/ vnd apleezenaya/
ka ẜchiß gir tas Chriſtus.
Evangelium am Tage Pauli Bekehrung/
Matth. 19.
PEteris ẜatziya vs JEſu/ Redſi/ mehß äſẜam wißno-
taļļ attſtahyuſchi/ vnd äſẜam ar töw ghayuſchi/ kas
attlätz mums no to? Bett JEſus ẜatziya vs teem: Pat-
tees es ẜacku jums/ ka juhß/ kattri juhß eſẜeeta ar mann
ghayuſchi/ eekſchan tahß Attdſimbſchanas/ kad tha Zill-
wäka Dähls ẜehdehß vs to Krähßlu ẜawas Ghodibas/
juhß arridſan ẜehdehſẜeeta vs diwipaddeßmitt Krähß-
leem/ vnd teeſẜahſẜeeta tohß diwipaddeßmitt zilltus J-
ſraëļa. Vnd kas attſtah Ähkus/ jeb Brahļus/ jeb Mahſ-
ẜas/ jeb Tähwu/ jeb Maht/ jeb Ꞩeewu/ jeb Bährnus/ jeb
Tierumus/ manna Wahrda dehļ/ tas to ẜimbtkahrtige
jembs/ vnd to muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu ee=manntohß.
Bett dauds kattri gir tee Pirrmi/ buhß tee Pehdeyi/ vnd
tee Pehdeyi/ buhß tee Pirrmi.
Epiſtel am Tage der Reinigung Mariae/
Malach. 3.
RAughi/ es ghribbu ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiet/ kattram man-
nà preekſchà to zeļļu ẜataiſẜiet buhß/ vnd dries nahx py
ẜawas Baſnizas tas Kungs/ kattru juhß meckleyeeta/
vnd tas Engels tahß ẜaliedſenaſchanas/ kattru juhß ghrib-
baht/ Raughi/ tas nahk/ ẜacka tas Kungs Zebaoth. Bett
kas warrehß to Deenu winja Attnahkſchanas pazeeſt? Vnd
kas paſtahwehß/ kad wings paradieſẜees? Aiſto wings gir
ka tas Vgguns weena Ꞩuddrabkalleya/ vnd ka tahß See-
pes tahß Maſghatayas/ wings ẜehdehß vnd kauſẜehß/ vnd to
Ꞩuddrabu tieries. Wings tohß Bährnus Lewi ſkieſties vnd
tieries ka Ꞩuddrabu/ vnd tad tee tam Kungam barriba Vp-
peri neſẜies/ eekſchan Taißnibas/ vnd tam Kungam labbe
pattix/ tas barriba Vpperis Juda vnd Jeruſalem/ ka zittà
reiſà vnd pirms daudſeem ghaddeem.
Evangelium am Tage der Reinigung Ma-
riae/ Luc. 2.
VNd kad tas Deenas winjo Skieſtiſchanas pehtz to
Baußli Moſis nahze/ neſẜe tee to (Bährnu JEſum)
eekſchan Jeruſalemes/ ka tee to preekſch to Kungu wäß-
tu/ ka ta Raxtietz ſtahw/ eekſchan to Baußli tha Kun-
ga: Wiſẜam Wieriſkam kas wißpirrmahk to Maht att-
pleſſch/ buhß tam Kungam
ẜwähtitam tapt. Vnd ka tee
dohtu to Vpperi/ ka ẜatzietz
gir eekſchan to Baußlu tha
Kunga/ weenu pahri Vh-
beļa=Balloſchus/ jeb diwi
jaunus Balloſchus.
Vnd raughi/ weens Zill-
wähx by eekſchan Jeruſale-
mes/ ar wahrdu Simeon/ vnd tas pahtz Zillwähx by
rahms vnd Deewabiyatais/ vnd ghaidiya vs to Preeku
Jſraël/ vnd tas Ꞩwähtz Gharrs by eekſchan to/ tam
by weena Adbilldeſchana kļu=uſẜi no to Ꞩwähtu Ghar-
ru/ tam nhe by to Nahwu redſeht/ pirrms tas to CHri-
ſtum tha Kunga redſeyis by. Vnd nahze zaur eedoſcha-
nu tha Ꞩwähta Gharra Baſnizà.
Vnd kad tee Wätzaki to Bährnu JEſum Baſnizà
ee=neſẜe/ ka tee par to darritu/ ka tas eeraddums by/ pehtz
to Baußlu/ tad jehme Wings to vs ẜawahm Rohkam/
vnd teitze Deewu/ vnd ẜatziya:
Kungs/ nu leetz tu tawu Kallpu Meerà aisbraukt/
ka tu ẜatziyis eſẜi.
Aiſto mannas Atzis gir tawu Peſtitayu redſeyuſchi.
Kattru tu ẜataiſẜiyis eſẜi wiſẜeems Ļaudeems parr
labb.
Weena ghaißma tohß Paggaņus apghaiſmoht/
vnd par ghohdu tawo Ļauſcho Jſrael.
Am Tage der Verkündigung Mariae/
Eſa. 7.
TAs Kungs runnaya vs Ahas/ vnd ẜatziya: Praſẜais
weenu Siem no to Kungu tawu Deewu/ jeb appak-
ſchan Elles dſiļļumà/ jeb aukſcham paſſchà Auxtumà.
Bett Ahas ẜatziya/ es nhe ghribbu praſẜiet/ ka es to Kungu
nhe kahrdenayo. Tad ẜatziya wings: Tad dſirrdeeta juhß no
to Nammu Dawid: Nhe gir tas ghann/ ka juhß teem Ļau-
deem ļaun darraht/ jums buhß arridſan mannu Deewu ap-
kaitenaht? Tapehtz jums tas Kungs patz weenu Siem dohß/
Raughi/ weena Jumprawa gir apghrutenata/ vnnd pee-
dſimbs weenu Dählu/ to tha dehwehß Jmmanuel/ Ꞩweeſtu
vnd Jählu=Mäddu tas ehdies/ ka tas ſinna to ļaunumu
attmeſt/ vnd to labbumu ißwehleht.
Evangelium am Tage der Verkündigung
Mariae/ Luc. 1. Cap.
SÄßtà Mehneſẜi tappa tas Engels Gabriels ẜuhtietz
no Deewu weenà Pily eekſchan Galilea/ ta Wahrds
ir Nazareth/ py weenas Jumprawas/ kattra ẜadär-
räta by weenam Wieram ar wahrdu Joſeps no to zilltu
Dawida/ vnd ta Jumprawa dehwehya Maria. Vnd
tas Engels nahze py tahß eekſchan/ vnd ẜatziya/ Deews
pallieds töw tu pilla (
puta,
no Deewu.) ſchälaſtibas/ tas
Kungs gir ar töw/ tu auxteteitzama no Ꞩeewahm. Bett
winja to rädſädama/ ißtruhzenayahß tha par winja
Wallodu/ vnd domaya/ kahda Ꞩweizenaſchana gir ta?
Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs tahß/ nhe byeſtees Maria/
tu eſẜi ſchäläſtibu py Deewu attradduſẜi/ Reds/ tu tapſi
apghrutenata eekſchan Meeſẜas/ vnd peedſimſẜi weenu
Dählu/ tha Wahrdu buhß töw JEſus dehweht/ tas
buhß leels/ vnd taps weens Dähls tha Wiſẜaauxtaka
dähwähtz/ vnd Deews tas Kungs dohß tam to Krähß-
lu ẜawa Tähwa Dawida/ vnd tas buhß weens Konings
par to Nammu Jacob muhſchige/ vnd tha Koninja=
Wallſtiba nhe mittehſẜees/
Tad ẜatziya Maria vs to Engeli/ ka buhß tam no-
tickt? Aiſto es nhe ſinnohß no kahdu Wieru? Tas En-
gels adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs tahß: Tas Ꞩwähtz
Gharrs par töw nahx/ vnd tas ſpähx tha Wiſẜa=auxta-
ka töw apähnohß. Tapehtz arridſan tas Ꞩwähtais/
kas no töw peedſimbs/ taps Deewa Dählß ẜaucktz.
Vnd jemm währa/ Eliſabeth/ tawa Radda/ gir arri-
dſan apghrutenata ar weenu Dählu wätza buhdama/
vnd eet nu ſäſtà Mehneſẜy/ kattrai tahda Ꞩlawa gir/ ka
tha nhe=aughliga äſẜoti. Aiſto Deews warr wiſẜas lee-
tas darriet. Bett Maria ẜatziya: Redſi/ es äßmu tha
Kunga Kallpone/ mann noteek/ ka tu ẜatziyis eſẜi. Vnd
tas Engelis ſkierehß no tahß.
Epiſtel am Tage Philippi vnd Jacobi/
Epheſ. 2.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Juhß nhe eſẜeeta wairs Weeſẜis/ vnnd
Ꞩweſſchineeki/ (
Dunaeburg,
Kirweneeki.) bett Namm-
neeki ar teem ẜwähteem/ vnd Deewa Ꞩaime/ vstaiſ-
ẜiti vs to dibbinu to Apuſtuļo vnd Proweeto/ kurr JEſus
CHriſtus tas Kackta=ackmins gir/ vs kattru wis tas Darrbs
ee=taiſẜietz/ augh par ẜwähtu Baſnizu/ eekſchaneeekſchan to Kungu/
vs kattru juhß arridſan vstaiſẜiti tohpeeta/ par Deewa Mah-
yaweetu eekſchan Gharru.
Evangelium am Tage Philippi vnd Jacobi/
Johan. 14.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Juhſẜai
Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß ißbietees/ Titzaht juhß vs Deewu/
tad titzaht juhß arridſan vs mann. Mannà Tähwa
Nammà gir dſiewoſchanas ghann/ kad tas ta nhe buh-
tu/ tad ghribbätu es ẜatziet
vs jums/ es no=eemu jums
to Weetu ẜattaiſẜiet. Vnd
jeb es no=eetu jums to Wee-
tu ẜattaiſẜiet/ ghribbu esghribbues to-
mähr attkall atteet/ vnd
juhß py mann jembt/ ka
juhß eſẜeeta kur es äßmu/
vnd kurr es no=eemu/ to ſin-
naht juhß/ vnd to zeļļu ſinnaht juhß arridſan.
Ꞩacka vs to Thomas/ Kungs/ mehß nhe ſiñam/ kurr-
pu tu ey/ vnd ka warram mehß to zeļļu ſinnaht? JEſus
ẜacka vs to: Es äßmu tas Zellſch/ vnd ta Taißniba/ vnd
ta Dſiewiba. Nheweens nhenahk py Tähwu/ ka zaur
mann. Kad juhß mann paſietaht/ tad paſietaht juhß
arridſan mannu Tähwu/ vnnd no ſcho laiku paſieſtaht
juhß to/ vnd eſẜeeta to redſeyuſchi.
Ꞩacka vs to Wilipps/
(Letti
Lipſts.) Kungs/ rahdi
mums to Tähwu/ tad gir mums ghann. JEſus ẜacka vs
to: Tick illge äßmu es py jums/ vnd tu mann nhe paſieſti.
Wilip (Lipſti/) kas mann räds/ tas räds to Tähwu/ ka
ẜacki tu tad/ Rahdi mums to Tähwu? Nhe titzi tu/ ka
es eekſchan to Tähwu/ vnd tas Tähws eekſchan mann
gir? Tohß Wahrdus kattrus es vs jums runnayo/ tohß
nhe runnayo es no ẜöw paſſchu. Bett tas Tähws kat-
ters eekſchan mann dſiewo/ tas patz darra tohß darr-
bus. Titzaht mann/ ka es eekſchan Tähwu/ vnnd tas
Tähws eekſchan mann gir/ ja nhe/ tad titzaht jehle man
to Darrbo dehļ. Pattees/ Pattees/ es ẜacko jums/ kas
vs mann titz/ tas arridſan tohß darrbus darries/ kat-
trus es darro/ vnd leelakus nhe ka ſchohß darries/ aiſto
es eemo py Tähwu. Vnnd ko juhß luhxeeta eekſchan
mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet/ ka tas Tähws
ghohdahtz tohp eekſchan to Dählu. Ko juhß luhxeeta
eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet.
Epiſtel am Tage Johannis des Täuffers/
Eſaiae 40.
EEpreezenayeeta/ eepreezenayeeta mannus Ļaudis/ ẜacka
juhſẜo Deews/ runnayeeta ar Jeruſalem ẜirrdige/ vnd
mahzaita tai/ ka winja (
a
) Darrbs pa ghallam gir/
Aiſto winja Noſeedſiba gir peedohta/ aiſto ta gir diwekahr-
tige dabbuyuſẜi no ta Kunga Rohku/ wiſẜo winjo Ghräko
dehļ.
a
(Darrbs)
Das im Hebreiſchen das Wort
ſtehe/ weiß ich woll/
vnnd daß es einem Streit/ oder Kriegsmacht heiſſe/ weiß ich auch
wol/ daher auch GOtt/ der HErr Zebaoth/ das iſt der HErr der
Heerſcharen genennet wird. Das ichs aber durchs Wort
(Darrbs/
welchs heiſt eine Arbeit/ ein Werckt) gedolmetſcht/ daß hab ich vmb
der eigentlichen meinung willen gethan/ die mir der gantze
contex-
tus
an die hand gegeben. Denn was ſonſten obgedachtes Wort
TSEBA
mehr ins gemein Iob. 7. v. 1.) vnnd inſonderheit (Nu-
heiſſe/ das wiſſen die Theologi, ſo der heiligen He-
breiſchen Sprache kündig ſind.
Turr gir weens ballxnis weena Mahzetaya Tuxneſẜy/
ẜattaiſẜeeta tham Kungam to zeļļu/ darraita wirſẜon lauku
ghluddänu zeļļu muhſẜam Deewam/ wiſẜahm Ee=leiyahm
buhß pa=auxtenatahm tapt/ vnd wiſẜeem Kallneem vnd Zäll-
meem buhß noſämmoteem tapt/ vnnd kas nheliedſans gir/
buhß liedſänam/ vnd kas nhetaißnis gir/ buhß taißnam tapt/
Aiſto tha Kunga ghodam buhß ſinnamam tapt/ vnnd wiſẜa
meeſẜa redſehß/ ka tha Kunga Mutte runna.
Evangelium am Tage Johannis des Täuf-
fers/ Luc. 1.
ELiſabethes laix nahze/ ka tay weßteeß by/ vnnd ta
weddehß weenu Dählu. Vnd winja Kaimiņņi vnd
Raddi dſirrdeya/ ka tas
Kungs leelu ſchäläſtibu py
winjas darriyis by/ vnnd
preezayahß ar winju. Vnd
tas notickahß aſtotà Dee-
nà/ nahze tee apghraiſiet
to Behrninju/ vnd dehwe-
ya to ẜawa Tähwa wahr-
dà Zacharias. Bett win-
ja Mahte adbilldeya/ vnd ẜatziya: Nhe/ bett tham buhß
Jaņam no=ẜaucktam buht. Vnd tee ẜatziya vs winjas:
Nhe weens nhe gir tawà Raddà/ kam tahds Wahrds
gir? Vnd tee mirckſchkinaya (
propriè
mit Augen
.) ẜawam
Tähwam/ ka wings to ghribbätu dehweht lickt. Vnnd
wings praſẜiya weenu ghalldinyu/ raxtiya vnd ẜatziya:
Winja Wahrds gir Janis. Vnnd tee iſẜabrienoyahß
wiſẜi/ vnd tuhdeļļ tappa winja Mutte vnnd Mehle att-
ſwabbinata/ vnd runnaya Deewu ſlawädams. Vnnd
weena Jßbaile nahze par wiſẜeem Kaimiņņeem. Vnnd
wiſẜa ſchy leeta tappa ſinnama par wiſẜu to Juddo Kall-
nu. Vnd wiſẜi kattri to dſirrdeya/ jehmehß py Ꞩirrds/
vnnd ẜatziya/ ko ſkeet tu/ kas buhß no ſcho Behrninju?
Aiſto tha Kunga Rohka by ar to.
Vnd winja Tähws Zacharias tappa pills no to ſwäh-
tu Gharru/ mahziya/ ẜatzidams:
Ꞩlawähtz gir tas Kungs/ tas Deews Jſrael/ Aiſto
tas gir peemeckleyis/ vnd peſtiyis ẜawus Ļaudis.
Vnnd gir mums pazehlis weenu Raggu tahß Peſti-
ſchanas/ eekſchan to Nammu ẜawa Kallpa Dawid.
Ka tas pirrmayohß laikohß runnayis gir zaur to
Mutt ẜawo ſwähto Proweeto.
Ka tas mums peſtitu no muhſẜeem Eenaideneekeem/
vnd no to Rohku wiſẜo tho kattri mums eenied.
Vnnd to ſchäläſtibu paradietu muhſẜeem Tähweem/
vnd attghada=tohß ẜawas ſwähtas ẜaliedſenaſchanas.
Vnd tahß Swehreſchanas/ kattru tas ſwehreyis gir
muhſẜam Tähwam Abrahamam/ mums doht.
Ka mehß peſtiti tohpam/ no tahß Rohkas muhſẜo
Waideneeko/ vnnd tam Kallpoyam bes bieſchanas tick
illge ka mehß dſiewoyam.
Eekſchan Ꞩwehtibas vnnd Taißnibas/ kattra tam
pattiek.
Vnd tu Behrnings tapſi weens Proweetz tha Wiſẜa=
auxtaka dähwähtz/ tu eeẜi preekſchan to Kungu/ ka tu
tam to Zeļļu ẜataiſẜi.
Vñ Adſiſchanu tahß Peſtiſchanas dohd ẜaweem Ļau-
deem/ kattra gir eekſchan winjo Ghräko Peedoſchanu.
Zaur to Ꞩirdsdibbenigu ſchäläſtibu muhſẜa Deewa/
zaur kattru mums peemeckleyis gir tas Auſtrums no
tahß Auxtibas.
Ka tas atſpiedätu teem/ kattri ẜehſch Tumbſẜumà/
vnd nahwes ähnà/ vnd ißtaiſẜitu muhſẜas Kahyas vs
to zeļļu tha Meera.
Vnd tas Bernings augha/ vnnd tappa ſtippris eek-
ſchan Gharru/ vnd by Tuxneſẜy/ teekams ka tam by preek-
ſcha nahkt/ preekſchan teem Ļaudeem Jſrael.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Petri vnd S. Pauli/
Act. 12.
TAs Konings Herodes peelicka tahß Rohkas py zitteem
no tahß draudzes tohß mohziet. Bett wings nomaita-
ya to Jäcobu Jana Brahli ar Sobeni. Vnnd kad
wings redſeya/ ka tas teem Juddeem patticka/ ẜayehme tas
irr Peteri. Bett tanny paſſchà laikà by tahß Deenas tahß
Ꞩalldahß=maiſes. Kad wings to nu ẜayehme/ licka wings to
Zeetumà/ vnd nodewe to tſchettreem tſchetterdaļļeem Karra=
wiereem/ to ghlabboht/ vnnd ſkittahß to pehtz Leeldeen teem
Ļaudeem preekſcha weſt. Vnd teeſẜa/ Peteris tappa Zeetumà
turrähtz/ bett ta Draudſe luhdſe par to Deewu beß mitte-
ſchanas. Vnnd kad Herodes to ghribbeya preekſcha weſt/
tanny paſſchà nackty ghulleya Peteris ſtarrpa diweem Kar-
yawiereem/ ẜaſẜeetz ar diweem Kehdehm/ vnnd tee Ꞩarrghi
preekſchan Durrweem ẜarrghaya to Zeetumu.
Vnd reds/ tas Engels ta Kungha attghaya/ vnd wee-
na ghaißma ſpiedeya eekſchan to ähku/ vnd ẜitta Peteri Ꞩah-
nohß/ vnd vsmohdenaya to/ vnd ẜatziya/ zellees tickuſẜche
aukſcham/ vnd tahß Kehdes kritta tam no winja Rohkahm.
Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs to/ apyohſẜees/ vnd apwellzees ẜa-
was Kurrpes. Vnd tas darriya tha. Vnd wings ẜatziya vs to:
Apmettees ẜawu Mehteli apkahrt ẜöw/ vnd nahtz ar mann.
Vnd tas ißghaya/ vnd ghaya winyam packaļļ/ vnd nhe ſin-
naya/ ka tas tam itt teeſcham noticktu zaur to Engeli/ bett
tas ſkitta weenu ghiemi rädſohtz.
Bett tee ghaya zaur to pirrmu vnd ohtru Wackti/ vnd
nahze py teem dſällſa Durrweem/ kattras vs Jällghawu eet/
tahß no ẜöw paſſcheem attdarriyahß. Vnd ißghaya/ vnd
ghaya weenu Eelas gharrumu/ vnd tudeļļ ſkierehß tas En-
gels no to. Vnd kad Peteris attghahdayahß/ ẜatziya tas/ Nu
ſinnu es teeſcham/ ka tas Kungs ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiyis gir/
vnd mann ißpeſtiyis no to Rohku Herodis/ vnd no wiſẜu
ẜarrghaſchanu to Juddo Ļauſcho.
Evangelium am Tage S. Petri vnnd S.
Pauli/ Matth. 16.
JEſus nahze eekſchan
teem Eſcheem tahß
Pilis Ceſarea Wilippi/ vnd
waizaya ẜawus Mahze-
kļus vnd ẜatziya/ ko ẜacka
tee Ļaudis/ kas ta Zillwä-
ka Dähls äſẜohtz? Tee ẜa-
tziya: Zitti ẜacka/ tu äſẜohtz
Janis tas Chriſtetais: Zitti/ tu äſẜohtz Elias/ zitti/ tu
äſẜohtz Jeremias/ jeb weens no teem Proweeteem.
Wings ẜatziya vs teem: Ko ẜackaht tad juhß/ kas es
äſẜohtz? Tad adbilldeya Simon Peteris/ vnd ẜatziya/
Tu eſẜi CHriſtus/ ta dſiewa Deewa Dähls.
Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs to: Ꞩwähtz
eſẜi tu Simon Jonaſa Dähls/ aiſto Meeſẜas vnd Aſ-
ẜins nhe gir töw to ẜatziyuſchi/ bett manns Tähws Deb-
beſẜies. Vnd es ẜacku töw arridſan/ tu eſẜi Peteris/ vnd
vs ſcho zeetu Ackmini ghribbu es vstaiſẜiet ẜawu Drauds/
vnd teem Wahrteem tahß Elles nhe buhß to vswah-
reht. Vnd ghribbu töw tahß Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibas Attſlä-
ghas doht/ Wiß ko tu vs Semmes ẜeeſẜi/ buhß arri-
dſan Debbeſẜies ẜeetam buht/ vnd wiß ko tu vs Semmes
attẜeeſẜi/ buhß arridſan Debbeſẜies attẜeetam buht. Tad
aißleedſe wings ẜaweem Mahzekļeem/ ka teem nhe by
nhe weenam ẜatziet/ ka wings JEſus/ tas CHriſtus
äſẜohtz.
Epiſtel am Tage Mariae Heimsuchung/
Rom. 12.
vide Dnic. 2.
nach der Erſchei-
nung CHriſti.
Evangelium am Tage Mariae Heimſu-
chung/ Luc. 1.
MAria mettehß kahyop tannies Deenahß/ vnd gha-
ya par to Kallnu tickuſche/ vs to Pili Juda/ vnd
nahze eekſchan to Nammu Zacharias/ vnd ſweizenaya
Eliſabeth. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad Eliſabeth to Ꞩwei-
zenaſchanu Mariae dſirrdeya/ deedams lehze tas
Bährns winja Meeſẜahß. Vnnd Eliſabeth tappa no
to Ꞩwähtu Gharru pilla/
vnd brehze ſtippre/ ẜatzida-
ma: Teickta eſẜi tu no
tahm Ꞩeewahm/ vnd teick-
ta gir ta Aughle tawas
Meeſẜas/ vnd no kurrenes
tas mann nahkahß/ ka tha
Mahte manna Kungha
py mann nahk? Redſi/ kad
es to ballxni tawas Ꞩweizenaſchanas dſirrdeyu/ pree-
zadammees lähze tas Bährns mannahß Meeſẜahß.
Vnd O ſwähta eſẜi tu/ kattra tu titzeyuſẜi eſẜi/ Aiſto tas
taps peepilldietz/ kas töw ẜatzietz gir no to Kungu.
Vnd Maria ẜatziya.
Manna Dwehſẜele teitz to Kunghu/ vñ manns Gharrs
epreehzeenayahß par to Deewu mannu Peſtitayu.
Aiſto tas gir to Sämmoſchanu ẜawas Kallpones
vsraudſiyis/ Redſi no ſcho laiku mann ẜwätu teix wiſẜi/
Bährno Bährni.
Aiſto tas gir leelu leethu py man darriyis/ katters
Spehziegs gir/ vnd kattra wahrds Swähtz gir.
Vnd winja Schälaſtiba palleek no weenas Zilltas ihs
ohtras/ py teems/ kattri to biya.
Tas gir ſpehziegs ar ẜawu Ällkonu/ vnd ißkaiſẜa tohß
kattri gräßni gir ẜawas Ꞩirds prahtà.
Tas gruſch tohß Spehzigus no to Kräſlu/ vnnd pa-
zeļļ tohs Sämmoſchus aukſcham.
Tohß Jßallkuſchus peepillda tas arr Labbibu/ vnnd
attſtay tohs Baggatus tuckſchus.
Tas peeminn tahs ſchälaſtibas/ vnnd vspallieds ẜa-
wam Kallpam Jſrael.
Ka tas gir runnayis muhſẜeem Tähweem/ Abraham
vnd winja Ꞩäklam muhſchige.
Vnnd Maria palicka py tahs py trim Mehneſẜeem/
pehtz greeſehs ta attkal vs Mahyu.
Epiſtel am S. Michaelis tage/
Apocal. 12.
WEens Karrſch pazehlees ẜöw Debbeſẜies/ Mickelis vnd
winja Engeļi Karŗoya ar to Satana/ vnd tas Sata-
nas Karŗoya/ vnd winja Engeļi/ vnd nhe vswahreya/
neds arridſan winjo Weeta tappa Debbeſẜies attraſta. Vnd
tas leels Puhkis/ ta wätza Tſchuhßka/ kattrai wahrds gir
tas Wälls vnd Satanas tappa ißmäſtz/ katters wiſẜu to
Paſẜaul ar Wiltu wadda/ vnd tappa mäſtz wirſẜon Sem̃es/
vnd winja Engeļi tappa arridſan nomäſti.
Vnd es dſirrdeya weenu leelu bàllxne/ ta ẜatziya Deb-
beſẜies/ Nu gir ta Peſtiſchana/ vnd tas Spähx/ vnd ta
Wallſtiba/ vnd ta Warra muhſẜa Deewa/ ẜawa CHriſtus
tappuſẜi/ tapehtz ka tas ißmäſtz gir/ katters tohß apẜuhdſeya
Deenas vnd Nacktis preekſchan Deewu. Vnd tee gir to vs-
warreyuſchi zaur ta Jähra Aſẜini/ vnd zaur to Wahrdu ẜa-
was leezibas/ vnd nhe gir ẜawu dſiewibu mieļoyuſchi/ ihß to
Nahwu. Tapehtz liexmoyeetees juhs Debbeſẜes/ vnd kattri
tur eekſchan dſiewo.
Evangelium am Tage S. Michaelis/
Matth. 18.
TEe Mahzekli ghaya py JEſu vnnd ẜatziya: Kas
gir tas Prawakais Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà? JEſus
aizenaya weenu Bährnu
py ẜöw/ vnd wedde to wid-
du ſtarrpan teem/ vnd ẜa-
tziya: Pattees/ es ẜacku
jums/ Ja juhß nhe apghre-
ſchatees/ vnd tohpeeta ka
tee Bährni/ tad juhß Deb-
beſẜo=Wallſtibà nhe nahxe-
ta. Kas ẜöw patz ẜämmo-
yahß ka ſchis Bährns/ tas
gir tas Prahwakays Deb-
beſẜo=Wallſtibà/ vnnd kas
tahdu Bährnu vsjämm eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/ tas
vsjämm mann. Bett kas weenu no ſcheem wiſẜeem ma-
ſakeem apghrehzi/ kattri eekſchan mann titz/ tam buhtu
labbahk/ ka tam weens Dſirna=ackminns py winja Rie-
kles pakahrtz taptu/ vnd apſlietzenahtz taptu Juhri/ kurr
wißdſiļļahk gir.
Way tai Paſẜaulei tahs apghrehzibas dehl. Ap-
ghrehzibai buhß jo nahkt/ bett tomähr way tam Zill-
wäkam/ zaur kattru Apghrehziba nahk. Bett ja töw
tawa Rohka jeb tawa Kahya Karrina/ no zehrt to/
vnnd mett to no ẜöw/ tas gir töw labbahk/ ka tu eek-
ſchan dſiewoſchanas Tiſlis/ jeb Krohplis ee=ey/ nhe ka
töw diwi Rohkas/ jeb Kahjas gir/ vnd tohpi eekſchan
to muhſchigu Vgguni ee=mäſts. Vnnd ja töw tawa
Atz Karrina/ ißrau to aran/ vnnd mett to no ẜöw/ tas
gir töw labbahk/ ka tu ar weenu Atzi eekſchan dſiewo-
ſchanas ee=ey/ nhe ka töw diwi Atzis gir/ vnd tohpi Elles
Vgguny eemäſts.
Peeraughaita/ ka juhß nhe weenu no ſcheem nitzina-
yeeta: Aiſto es ẜacku jums: Winjo Engeļi Debbeſẜies/
räds allaſchien to Waighu manna Tähwa Debbeſẜies.
Aiſto tha Zillwäka Dähls gir natzis/ ſwähtus darriet
tohs kattri paſudduſchi gir.
Evangelium von der Tauffe Chriſti/
Matth. 3. Cap.
TAnny laikà nahze JEſus aran Galileero Sem-
mes/ py to (vppi) Jordan py Jani/ ka tas ẜöw no
to licktees chriſtitees. Bett Janis leedſe tam/ vnd ẜatzi-
ya/ Mann buhtu ghan wayaga biyis/ ka es no töw
chriſtietz taptu/ vnd tu nahz py mann? Bett JEſus
adbildeya/ ẜatzidams vs to: Laid nu to tha buht/ tha
peeklayahß mums wiſẜu Taißnibu peepilldiet. Tad ļah-
we wings tam.
Vnd kad JEſus chriſtietz by/ ißkahpe Wings dries
aran to Vdeni. Vnd redſi/ tad attwehrehß tas Debbeß
par Winju. Vnnd Janis redſeya to Deewa Gharru/
ihten ka kahdu Ballodi ſemmeh nolaiſchohtz/ vnnd par
winyu nahkam. Vnd redſi weens Ballxnis no Debbes
ẜatziya: Ꞩchiß gir manns mieļais Dähls/ py kattru
mann labbs Prahtz gir (
vel,
katters mann pattiek.)
Epiſtel am Friedenstage/ welcher Jährlich
im Fürſtenthumb Churland vnd Semgallen/ auff an-
ordnung Fürſtl. Durchl. Hertzog Gotthardts/
etc.
Chriſt-
milder gedächtniß/ wegen des zwiſchen dem Pohlen vnnd Moßco-
viter/ betreffend den Lieffländiſchen Krieg/
anno 1582.
durch ſon-
derbare ſchickung Gottes/ getroffen Friedens/ den 15. Ja-
nuarij ſeyerlich gehalten wird.
Syrach. 50.
NV pateizeeta wiſẜi deewam/ katters leelas Leetas darra
wiſẜahß Maļļahß/ katters mums no Mahtes Meeſẜas
dſiewus vs turr/ vnd darra mums wiſẜu labbu. Wings
ghribbätu mums doht preezighu Ꞩirrdi/ vnd doht allaſchien
Meeru muhſẜohß Laikohß eekſchan Jſrael. Vnnd ka winja
Ꞩchälaſtiba allaſch py mums pa=leek/ vnnd attpeſti mums/
teekams mehß dſiewoyam.
Ewangelium
Meera=Deena/
Luc. 13. Cap.
TAnny laykà paſluddenaya zitti tam Kungam JE-
ſu no teem Galileeŗeem/ kattro Aſẜini Pilatus ar
winyo Vpperi ẜajautzis by. Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd
ẜatziya vs teem: Skeetaht juhß/ ka ſchee Galileeŗi par
wiſẜeem Galileeŗeem Ghräzeneeki biyuſſchi gir/ tapehtz
kad tee to zeetuſſchi gir? Es ẜacku/ Nhe/ Bett ja juhß
nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki/ tad irr juhß wiſẜi arridſan tha tapſ-
ẜeeta nomaitati. Jeb ſkeetaht juhß/ ka tee aſtohņpadeß-
mitti/ vs kattreem tas Tuhrnis eekſchan Siloha kritta/
vnnd noẜitta tohß/ gir noſeguſſchi par wiſẜeem Zillwä-
keem/ kattri eekſchan Jeruſalemes dſiewo? Es ẜacku/
Nhe: Bett ja juhß nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki/ tad irr juhß
wiſẜi tha tapſẜeeta nomaitati.
Bett wings ẜatzija teem ſchadu Liedſibu: Zillwä-
kam by weens Wiega=Kohx/ taß by dehſtietz ẜawà Wie-
na=Kallnà/ vnd nahze/ Aughļus no to meckleht/ vnnd
tohß nhe attradda. Tad ẜatzija wings vs to Wiena=
Dahrßneeku: Redſi/ Es äßmu nu tries Ghaddohß ick=
ghaddohß nahzis/ vnd Aughļus meckkleyis/ vs ſcho Wie-
ges=Kohku/ vnnd tohß nhe attrohmu/ no=zehrt to/ ko
kahwe tas to Semmi? Bett tas adbilldeja/ ẜatzidams
vs winju: Kungs/ ļaw winju wehl ſcho Ghaddu/ tee-
kam Es apkahrt to rohku/ vnd apẜuhdo to/ arrieg
wings Aughļus näßtu/ Ja nhe/ tad pehtz
nozehrt to.
Die trawrige Hiſtoria der er-
bärmlichen
Zerſtörung der Statt
Jeruſalem/ 40. Jahr nach des
